scripts.prepare: set-defaults .vscode && forge install --no-git foundry-rs/forge-std@v1.8.0 safe-global/safe-smart-account@v1.4.1 || echo ''
scripts.start: zellij --layout zellij.kdl a template-redprint || zellij --layout zellij.kdl -s template-redprint
scripts.watch_test: as-soon -w script -w src -w test pnpm test
scripts.deploy_000_all: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost DEPLOYMENT_OUTFILE=deployments/31337/.save_all.json ldenv -m localhost forge script script/000_DeployAll.s.sol -vvvv --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
scripts.deploy_100_safe: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost DEPLOYMENT_OUTFILE=deployments/31337/.save_safe.json ldenv -m localhost forge script script/100_DeploySafe.s.sol -vvvv --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
scripts.setup_200_superchain: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost DEPLOYMENT_OUTFILE=deployments/31337/.save_superchain.json ldenv -m localhost forge script script/200_SetupSuperchain.s.sol -vvvv --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
scripts.deploy_201_address_manager: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost DEPLOYMENT_OUTFILE=deployments/31337/.save_address_manager.json ldenv -m localhost forge script script/201_DeployAddressManager.s.sol -vvvv --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
scripts.deploy_202_proxy_admin: DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT=localhost DEPLOYMENT_OUTFILE=deployments/31337/.save_proxy_admin.json ldenv -m localhost forge script script/202_DeployPloxyAdmin.s.sol -vvvv --private-key @@DEPLOYER_PRIVATE_KEY --rpc-url @@RPC_URL_:DEPLOYMENT_CONTEXT,RPC_URL --broadcast
